channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
question 1 I just figured out how to make a server. I am very happy,but I dont know how to make people owners. I am using Hellzend source. My server is running and everything,and I know how to make people mods and admins. on my server u go to data and open the text file of the thing you want such as administrators.txt and add the name u want ,but i dont know how to make people owners. if any of u could help me i would be happy
question 2 do any of you know where all of my charactors are being saved to. I know in other servers it gets saved in a folder called characters , moreinfo,or saved games something like that. But a few people have made charactors in my server and it saves there files,but I dont know where. if you guys know where plz tell me.
question 3 when I try to log into moparscape it comes up with this big white square. It wont show the 2 mopars or logon or anything. It still has the sdvertisments on the sides,and the buttons on top of the screen such as forums,etc if any of you guys/girls have every had anything like this happen to you please tell me how to fix it. This is my first question on these forums. Im new. You people r probubly laughing right now because the answer to all these questions r in plain sight,but i cat really find them. thank you for all ur help

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

1.GO to the char file and edit the person rights to owner( I belive its 4?!?)
2.Char files should be in the character file…
3.Use the client(download, big pic at top of teh screen)

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @pkiller pkiller
item.description:
@pkiller wrote:

1 i think you make player rights 3 dont know
2 the way i find it is serch you pc for your user name and in one of them it will show your stats and rights and so on
3…this happens to me all you need to do is close the window and re open it if that dose not work restart your pc

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @zach_the_killa zach_the_killa
item.description:
@zach_the_killa wrote:

question 1
I just figured out how to make a server. I am very happy,but I dont know how to make people owners. I am using Hellzend source. My server is running and everything,and I know how to make people mods and admins. on my server u go to data and open the text file of the thing you want such as administrators.txt
and add the name u want ,but i dont know how to make people owners. if any of u could help me i would be happy

question 2
do any of you know where all of my charactors are being saved to. I know in other servers it gets saved in a folder called characters , moreinfo,or saved games something like that. But a few people have made charactors in my server and it saves there files,but I dont know where. if you guys know where plz tell me.

question 3
when I try to log into moparscape it comes up with this big white square. It wont show the 2 mopars or logon or anything. It still has the sdvertisments on the sides,and the buttons on top of the screen such as forums,etc if any of you guys/girls have every had anything like this happen to you please tell me how to fix it. This is my first question on these forums. Im new. You people r probubly laughing right now because the answer to all these questions r in plain sight,but i cat really find them. thank you for all ur help
